pages.text: And they do not give you an example (or question) unless We bring you the truth and the best explanation (of it)
Those who are gathered (lying down) on their faces into hell, they are in worst position and are far (lost) from the way
And We have certainly given Moses the book and appointed his brother Aaron with him as his minister
Then We said: you both go to the people who denied Our signs. Then We destroyed them, a total destruction
And We drowned people of Noah when they denied the messengers and We made them a sign for the people, and We prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers
And (We also destroyed) Aad and Thamud and the inhabitants of the Rass (the well) and many generations between them
And to each one We gave examples, and We destroyed them all, a total destruction
And they have certainly come upon the town that was rained on, the bad rain. Did they not used to see it? No, but they do not expect resurrection
And when they see you, they only take you as a joke (saying): is this the one whom God sent as a messenger
He almost led us away from our gods, if we had not persevered on them. They will know who is more off the (right) way when they see the punishment
Did you see he who took his desire as his god? Are you his advocate
